description.text: A kraken slayer who chooses a weapon as her divine bond may either increase her weapon's enhancement bonus or add any of the following properties to her weapon: axiomatic, brilliant energy, defending, grayflame, holy, keen, merciful, seaborne, and speed. A kraken slayer who chooses a mount must select one suitable for an aquatic environment, such as an elasmosaurus, giant seahorse, or orca.
